name: Just Bounce The Ball
description:
Just Bounce The Ball!

Sounds easy enough, doesn't it? Well, there is a tricky part, you can only move one paddle at a time , so good luck trying to keep the ball inside the box if you dont wanna lose ;)

How to play:

Your goal is to keep the ball in bounds, how do you do it? You can move the paddles to hit the ball to bounce it and turn the box to change the direction of the ball back to you to hit it again.

A, D / Left and right arrow to move the paddles

Left and right mouse click to rotate the box and change paddle

Or, if you're playing on mobile, just enable "mobile mode" and enjoy!
